lines.text: They get paid to be nice. They don't really mean it.

[First meets the Cain Children]
Well Hi.
Hi I'm Patty Pepper and this is my Husband Harland. Now who do we have here?
Well this is Jessie, and this is baby Jason, Julie, Susie and Cindy.
Well aren't you a bunch of cuties! You must be exhausted. Are you hungry? I bet you are.
What a little dream boat. Here why don't you let me take him for you?
It's OK I can do it.

[to the other children]
Save it! You don't know nothing! Zero! Nothing!
They say we stink, they say we wear garbage can clothes.
You don't stink, they do. They're such butts.
